channel.title: Joint Workshop of NTT Labs (Japan) and NTT Research (USA)
channel.description: Recent content on Joint Workshop of NTT Labs (Japan) and NTT Research (USA)

item.title: Registration
item.description: Registration is free, but mandatory. The maximum number of participants is 80. To register this workshop, please send the information listed below to the following e-mail address: saho dot uchida dot pn at hco dot ntt dot co dot jp Name Affiliation

item.title: Organizers
item.description: Tatsuaki Okamoto Masayuki Abe Ryo Nishimaki

item.title: Speakers
item.description: Brent Waters (NTT Research Inc.) Daniel Wichs (NTT Research Inc.) Aron Laszka (NTT Research Inc.) Shin’ichiro Matsuo (NTT Research Inc.) Masayuki Abe (NTT Secure Platform Laboratories) Mehdi Tibouchi (NTT Secure Platform Laboratories) Takashi Yamakawa (NTT Secure Platform Laboratories) Ryo Nishimaki (NTT Secure Platform Laboratories) Bernardo David (IT University of Copenhagen) (formerly research intern at NTT Secure Platform Laboratories) Jiaxin Pan (NTNU) (formerly research intern at NTT Secure Platform Laboratories)

item.title: Venue
item.description: The venue is Hotel Granvia Kyoto in Kyoto This event will be held in Soushi-room (5F) Access to Hotel Granvia Kyoto It takes about 1 hour by train (JR) from Kobe, where Asiacrypt 2019 is held. Please see also here

item.title: Schedule
item.description: The event schedule on December 13th (tentative) 8:30 Check-in 9:00 - 9:50 TBA by Brent Waters 9:50 - 10:40 TBA by Mehdi Tibouchi 11:00 - 11:30 On Black-Box Extensions of Non-Interactive Zero-Knowledge Arguments by Masayuki Abe 11:30 - 12:00 Compact NIZKs from Standard Assumptions on Bilinear Maps by Ryo Nishimaki 12:00 Lunch (on your own) 13:30 - 14:20 Extracting Randomness from Extractor-Dependent Sources by Daniel Wichs 14:20 - 15:10 Finding Collisions in a Quantum World: Quantum Black-Box Separation of Collision-Resistance and One-Wayness by Takashi Yamakawa 15:30 - 16:00 TBA by Aron Laszka 16:00 - 16:30 TBA by Shin’ichiro Matsuo 16:40 - 16:55 Publicly Verifiable MPC and Applications by Bernardo David 16:55 - 17:10 TBA by Jixain Pan Abstract TBA Brent Waters (NTT Research Inc.
